Title: A Whiff and a Prayer
Plot: Denny's strong conservative values are put to the test when the firm represents a Democratic congressman who refused to keep a promise to his supporters. Alan tries to forget about Tara as he prepares to defend Catherine who is on trial for murder. Meanwhile, Sara is given a bizarre ultimatum.
GuestStars: Bob Rumnock,  Lisa Kaminir,  Michael Bryan French,  Ryan Cutrona,  John Thaddeus,  H. Richard Greene,  William Russ,  Kurt Fuller,  Lou Beatty Jr.
